Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Résidence Villa Daubenton places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Ecole normale superieure and close to Notre Dame Cathedral. This residence is close to Louvre Museum and Eiffel Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 16 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional features include babysitting/childcare and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ecole normale superieure - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Place de la Contrescarpe - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Jardin des Plantes - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Grande Galerie de l'Evolution - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Arenes de Lutece - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Pantheon - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Paris Observatory - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Pierre et Marie Curie University - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Luxembourg Gardens - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Menagerie du Jardin des Plantes - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sorbonne University - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Paradis Latin - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Cartier Foundation for Contemporary Art - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Luxembourg Palace - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Paris Catacombs - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 12 km / 7.5 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 24.6 km / 15.3 mi

The preferred airport for Résidence Villa Daubenton is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Residence Villa Daubenton is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 23.2 km / 14.4 mi.
